page.title: 08PETS IN SHIPSTON
page.content: There is currently a campaign in the town of Shipston-on-Stour to discourage people from letting their pet dogs foul the pavements. We interviewed people in the town centre about their pets.Approximately two out of every three people we interviewed had a pet of some sort. Cats and dogs were equally the most popular,35% of the people interviewed had one or the other(or both.) Here is a list of the most common pets in order of popularity: cats and dogs,fish,rabbits,budgerigars,hamsters parrots,mice and guinea pigs. Some people kept quite unusual pets. One lady kept 80 newts.There were also snakes chameleons,spiders,terrapins and tree crabs. One person kept 700 assorted birds.
